title: Define Project Scope and Requirements
description: Gather and document the requirements for the PureGraphProcessingEngine, including the target use cases (e.g., graph analytics, machine learning, etc.), performance goals (such as latency, throughput, and memory usage), expected features (graph traversal algorithms, graph visualization, etc.), and non-functional requirements such as scalability, maintainability, security considerations (including data privacy and protection), error handling, logging, and monitoring. Collaborate with team members to ensure comprehensive coverage of requirements.

title: Design System Architecture (Updated)
description: Update the description for clarity and precision. Design the overall architecture of the PureGraphProcessingEngine, focusing on core components, data structures, and algorithms suitable for large-scale data analysis while prioritizing pure functions and immutability.

title: Implement Core Graph Processing Engine
description: Develop the core graph processing engine using pure functions and immutable data structures, following the defined architecture.

title: Design and Implement Data Storage
description: Design and implement the data storage solution for the graph data, considering scalability and performance requirements.

title: Develop User Interface
description: Design and implement a user interface for interacting with the PureGraphProcessingEngine, including data visualization and analysis tools.

title: Implement Security Measures
description: Implement security measures to ensure the protection of data and the system, including authentication, authorization, and encryption.

title: Set up Continuous Integration and Deployment
description: Set up a continuous integration and deployment pipeline for the PureGraphProcessingEngine, including automated testing and deployment to production.

title: Develop Test Suite
description: Design and implement a comprehensive test suite for the PureGraphProcessingEngine, including unit tests, integration tests, and performance tests.

title: Write Documentation
description: Prepare comprehensive documentation for the PureGraphProcessingEngine, including user guides, developer guides, and API references.
